ðŸ“– Summary: The 'face_looker' repository provides tools to generate AI-powered gaze-tracking face images. It offers two methods: using a Replicate model for easy generation and a Python script for advanced customization. The generated images can be used to create interactive React components that follow the cursor, enhancing user engagement in web applications.
